rooms.description: Entry hall with a reception area incorporating Vastu guidelines: east-facing entrance for energy flow, ensuring natural light and ventilation.
Spacious living room adjacent to the dining area. Open-plan design with large windows on south and west facades for ample natural light and cross ventilation.
Open dining space that extends into the living area, featuring sliding glass doors to access the outdoor balcony and pool area.
Compact yet functional kitchenette with east-facing window for morning light. Includes storage solutions compliant with local building norms.
Bathroom attached to the living area, designed with proper ventilation and drainage in accordance with local standards.
Studio apartment on the ground floor, featuring a large balcony facing north-west for natural light and privacy. Includes an integrated study space and built-in storage.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow and ample daylight.
Large windows to enhance natural light and ventilation across the floor plan.
Balcony integrated with studio apartment, providing outdoor space for relaxation.
